Class ncsa.hdf.object.Group 

java.lang.Object
    |
    +----ncsa.hdf.object.HObject
            |
            +----ncsa.hdf.object.Group
public abstract class Group
extends HObject
Group is the superclass for HDF4 and HDF5 group, inheriting the HObject.

Group is an abstract class. Its implementing sub-classes are the H4Group and H5Group. This class includes general information of a group object such as members of a group and common operation on groups for both HDF4 and HDF5.

Members of a group may include other groups, datasets or links.

Version:
1.0 12/12/2001
Author:
Peter X. Cao, NCSA

Group(FileFormat, String, String, Group, long[])
Creates a group object with specific name, path, and parent.

addToMemberList(HObject)
Adds an HObject to the member list of this group.
getMemberList()
Returns the list of members of this group.
getParent()
Returns the parent group.
isRoot()
Checks if it is a root group.
removeFromMemberList(HObject)
Removes an HObject from the member list of this group.

Group
public Group(FileFormat fileFormat,
             java.lang.String name,
             java.lang.String path,
             Group parent,
             long oid[])
          Creates a group object with specific name, path, and parent.

Parameters:
fileFormat - the HDF file.
name - the name of this group.
path - the full path of this group.
parent - the parent of this group.
oid - the unique identifier of this data object.

Parameters:

Parameters:
object - the HObject to be removed from the member list.

          Returns the list of members of this group.
